title: No puedo opinar de este producto.
body: Me gusto el diseño, pero no me valía para la cafetera que había comprado, es una pena estoy utilizando los filtros de papel para el cafe ,que esos si me valen.
author: Carlos s
date: Revisado en España el 14 de julio de 2023

title: Canbiazo
body:
Play Video
No concuerda con el producto k ofrece....ni es igual a la marca de la cafetera y el asa k lleva esta roto....y todo por casi 20 euros k robo por dios
author: Miguel Angel arellano
date: Revisado en España el 26 de mayo de 2023

title: Filtro
body: Ho comprato il filtro per una macchina da caffè della stessa marca ma stranamente non si chiude il tappo
author: michael
date: Revisado en Italia el 17 de febrero de 2024

title: Doesn't fit!! DO NOT BUY!!!
body: Please do not be tempted to buy. When you first get it out the packet, it looks the same as the genuine part. But, fit it into your machine, and you'll find your coffee machine lid will not close. It's slightly too big!!! I have since found that another family member has had the exact problem. I don't normally bother writing a review, but, these filters just don't fit. Go to the main maker of them instead!!
author: Burt
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 24 de enero de 2024

title: Una delusione. Non è il filtro raffigurato.
body:
Sono rimasta molto delusa perché il filtro che mi è arrivato non è quello raffigurato nella foto.
Diversamente da quello che viene mostrato, il filtro che è arrivato non ha le tacche laterali e il coperchio della macchinetta non si chiude ma l’erogazione del caffè avviene comunque.
Sto pensando di renderlo.
author: Giuliana Monzu'
date: Revisado en Italia el 25 de febrero de 2023

title: Funziona bene
body: Funziona bene
author: Franco Polidori
date: Revisado en Italia el 3 de enero de 2023

title: Unzureichend
body: Der Deckel er Kaffeemaschine läßt sich nicht schließen. Der Filter lasst einiges Kaffeepulver durch.
author: Hans Bulat
date: Revisado en Alemania el 19 de noviembre de 2022

title: Just the ticket
body: Spot on
author: Graham Rothery
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 21 de julio de 2022

title: Not the item pictured
body:
Unfortunately this is not the item pictured, as
it doesn't have the notches in the side. This means that the lid of the coffee maker doesn't close. It still works, but disappointed that it isn't the product descibed.
author: Amazon Customer
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 20 de junio de 2022

title: Not what is shown in the photo.
body: The original, and the photo, have a 2 cutouts on the rim. The item shipped did not so is clear misrepresentation. The coffee maker lid does not stay closed now. Poor practice.
author: Stuie
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 6 de mayo de 2022

title: Filtre
body: Ne s'adapte pas au machine du même nom!
author: Tilleul Thierry
date: Revisado en Francia el 18 de octubre de 2020

title: Exactly what we needed
body: Fit my coffee machine perfectly, these filters do end up getting holes in them after a lot of use so its great being able to get a replacement.
author: danii
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 6 de enero de 2021

title: Not as pictured
body: I ordered this as it looks the same as the filter in my machine. When it arrived it is not the same one so doesn’t fit.
author: Mrs
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 9 de abril de 2022

title: Lies!!
body: Not the same as the one in the photo!! The first image is the one i received today the second image is the original product
author: Evrim
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 23 de octubre de 2020

title: Not same as original
body: Stained, even though the original didn't. So this is a cheap ripoff it seems. Not same quality as one coming with coffee machine
author: Arturs
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 20 de febrero de 2022

title: Not the same as the original!
body:
The item is a different design to the one that comes with the coffee maker, it is awkward to get the lid to close down due to the design of this filter.
I am using it and it does work but as with most replacements they are rarely ever exact to the one that comes with it.
author: patrick
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 10 de septiembre de 2020

title: Replaced damaged original filter..
body: Works fine, fits fine, will probably last a few years like the old one.
author: Stagger Lee
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 3 de junio de 2020

title: Perfect replacement.
body: We accidentally threw our water lid one out. This is a perfect replacement.
author: LeachAmazon Customer
date: Revisado en Reino Unido el 24 de enero de 2021

title: Fits all machines
body: They are brilliant! I buy loads of them as someone in the office keeps throwing them away!

title: Great Service
body: Next dau delivery as promised. Fits my coffee maker perfectly.

title: Coffee filter
body: Does what it is supposed do . No coffee gets though the filter.

title: Excellent filter
body: It does everything one could expect. Works very well

title: its a filter
body: its a filter, it filters.
